translations: 证实，确证（陈述等）；使坚固（corroborate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Benjamin (voiceover) : Ray swiped through document after document corroborating this.
sentences.translation: 本杰明(旁白)：雷摆出一份又一份档案来佐证。

sentences.sentence: In fact, the authors detail several hundred incidents, nearly all with several corroborating eyewitness reports.
sentences.translation: 而事实上，作者详述了几百个事件，几乎每个都附有若干目击证人的证词。(说辞貌似有点贬义的味道)。
